meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Public Comments
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for public comments on agenda items IV - VIII.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the May 14, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolutions for West Virginia Apartments
agenda_items.description: Consideration of financing resolutions for a multifamily residential development.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Renewal of Single-Family Home Mortgage Program
agenda_items.description: Resolutions relating to the Corporation’s participation in the mortgage program.

agenda_items.title: Review of Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the Treasurer’s report for the four-month period ending on April 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review of Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of June 7, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.
